parameters.name: ColUndercut1
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from one direction that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColUndercut2
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from a second direction that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColOccluded
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from both directions that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColStraddle
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces with draft in both directions that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColBase
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces that do not form undercuts; that is, all faces except the undercut faces

parameters.name: BCoordInput
parameters.description: True to enable coordinate input to control the direction of pull, false to not

parameters.name: Dx
parameters.description: x coordinate to control the direction of pull

parameters.name: Dy
parameters.description: y coordinate to control the direction of pull

parameters.name: Dz
parameters.description: z coordinate to control the direction of pull

title: IFeatureManager.MoldUndercutDetect2
description: Detects trapped, also called undercut, areas in a model that cannot be ejected from the mold.
signature:

   System.Int32
ColUndercut1
,
   System.Int32
ColUndercut2
,
   System.Int32
ColOccluded
,
   System.Int32
ColStraddle
,
   System.Int32
ColBase
,
   System.Boolean
BCoordInput
,
   System.Double
Dx
,
   System.Double
Dy
,
   System.Double
Dz
)

parameters.name: ColUndercut1
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from one direction that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColUndercut2
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from a second direction that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColOccluded
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces invisible from both directions that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColStraddle
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces with draft in both directions that form an undercut

parameters.name: ColBase
parameters.description: Value (COLORREF type) that specifies the color for the faces that do not form undercuts; that is, all faces except the undercut faces

parameters.name: BCoordInput
parameters.description: True to enable coordinate input to control the direction of pull, false to not
